issue.title: [Java] varchar value buffer much larger than expected
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4532](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4532). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There's a bug in BaseVariableWidthVector.java::setSafe that's causing the value buffers to be much larger than expected. This causes memory wastage.
